name: Five Nights at Pawelek Bakery
description:
Do you know what happen in february 14th 2007 in certain polish bakery?

...

I won't tell you~
I'll let you experience it.

Controls:
Space. 

This game may contain, violence, murder, suicide... well bad things like that, so players discretion is advised. 

This game was meant to be entry for Code it out first game jam. 

Limitations were: Space-bar only
The Theme was: Try, Try, Again.

Credits to:

Ignof - UI
Imie - Main music
yannyartz - This awesome art. (Check out her works! https://www.instagram.com/yannyartz/)
Rest of a game by Shadow Kitsune - one music chord progression, pixel art, programming.

Special thanks to some people from discord for idea, and of course You, the Player! Someone without who making it could be pointless
